nodes.bodyText: Could we use java.nio.file.Path instead? com.yahoo.path.Path is marked Beta and if we can use com.yahoo.path.Path internally only it would be nice. I haven't looked into if it's feasible, though
java.nio.file.Path requires a FileSystem though, so not sure its suitable. com.yahoo.path.Path is better than String though.
You are right, doesn't look like that will work. Agreed that it's better than String.
